==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|水|曜}}

===Etymology===
/suieu/ > /suiyoː/. Originally it meant Mercury<ref name="Amoghavajra" />. A [[calque]] of {{cog|la|dies Mercurii}} and its descendants, reinterpreting the day as having been named after the planet [[Mercury]] (instead of the Roman god). Compare {{m|ja|水星|tr=suisei|gloss=Mercury (planet)}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/suijoː/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|すいよう|hhira=すいえう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} planet [[Mercury]]
# [[Wednesday]]

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|水曜日}} (suiyōbi)

===See also===
* {{l|ja|七曜}} (shichiyō)
